verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Our God He Reigns Forever newline He Reeigns with power and love newline Let Earth Bow down before Him newline For He is Exalted

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: We look to Yahweh, Yahweh newline Forever Yahweh,Yahweh

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: Our Hope is God Almighty newline His love is Greater than all newline Lift High the God of Heaven newline Give all the Honour

verse.name: c2
verse.lines: We look to Yahweh, Yahweh newline Our hope is Yahweh, Yahweh

verse.name: b1
verse.lines: And He Shall Reign Forever newline He Shall Reign Forever newline He Shall Reign Forever, newline and Ever newline Our God
